lines.text: Well, there's a big pile of... something here.
Whatever it was burned up completely, so...
Maybe that wasn't an accident? Maybe it was something they wanted destroyed!
Doesn't really tell me how it happened, though.
And I'm gonna need some more specific info on what that was that went up in smoke, too.
There wasn't anything <c=#FF00FF>in the ashes</c> that'd give us a clue, was there?
